sourcesContent:
import useLanguage from "../hooks/useLanguage" import DrawerCircle from "./drawers/DrawerCircle" import useTimer from "../hooks/useTimer" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome" import ToggleSelect from "./ToggleSwitch" import useChangeMode from "../hooks/useChangeMode" import { faSun, faMoon } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import useTextIsHidden from "../hooks/useTextIsHidden" import { TextInput } from "./TextInput" interface SettingsProps { lang: string | undefined openSettings: boolean closeSettings: () => void } const Settings = ({ openSettings, closeSettings, lang } : SettingsProps) => { const { mainLang } = useLanguage(lang) const { timerSwitch, toggleTimer } = useTimer() const { changeMode } = useChangeMode() const { hasSensitiveWords, warningText, text, setText } = useTextIsHidden(lang) return (

{mainLang.language.settings}

{mainLang.language.settings_note}

{mainLang.language.timer}

{mainLang.language.timer_note}

{mainLang.language.screen_appearance}

{mainLang.language.hidden_answer_text_title}

setText(e.target.value)} autoComplete="off"/>

{mainLang.language.hidden_answer_text_desc}

{warningText}

 ) } export default Settings
